DOC.HEADLINE: NEWSWIRE : MISCELLANY
DOC.TEXT: Los Angeles is one of 22 cities or regions that have applied for admission to Major_League Soccer ( MLS ) , the United States ' proposed new professional league scheduled to begin play next spring . . . . Dave Albritton , 81 , an Ohio State teammate of Jesse Owens and silver medalist in the high_jump at the 1936 Berlin Olympics , was buried at Dayton , Ohio . Pro Football Former San Francisco 49er Pro Bowl receiver Gene Washington will become director of football development for the NFL .
